item.title: Saga deprecated 警告
item.description: What happens? [...effects] has been deprecated in favor of all([...effects]), please update your code it does not effect dva.js, its redux saga api update, you just need to do this effects: { * query(action, {call, put, all}) { yield all([]) } } Redux saga apis:
